name: Re:record
description:
Re:record

As a retired engineer you rebuild a machine to get back in time and change the course of history. Rewind yourself and face the past. Keep on going and don't hasitate. The clock is ticking...

Instructions:

Game can be played with a keyboard or a gamepad. To proceed in cutscenes press the Spacebar, to proceed in the dialogs press T.

Your goal in the game

On each level besides the last one your goal is to rewind the tape back to 00:00 and to not allow it to reach it's end. You can rewind the tape by pressing R, but only if you have collected the time-orbs containing time pieces. You can collect the orbs by killing the enemies, that will try to steal your precious time. Press E to fight the enemies.

Final level goal On the final level, your goal is to find the time machine so you can destroy it.
